column1: Integrative Counselling and Psychotherapy Studies MSc (UKCP Accredited)
column5: This course is accredited by the Universities Training College (UTC) of the United Kingdom Council for Psychotherapy (UKCP).The primary aim of the MSc Integrative Counselling and Psychotherapy Studies is to facilitate students’ academic and practical professional development as part of the requirements for professional registration in psychotherapeutic counselling/psychotherapy. This allows them in order to be able to practice as Psychotherapeutic Counsellors or Psychotherapists in a range of public, private and voluntary sector contexts.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
